channel.title: INtech
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtech, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Anthropic Wants Its AI Agent to Control Your Computer
item.description: Claude is the first major AI model to be able to take control of a computer to do useful work.

item.title: Soundpeats' Capsule3 Pro+ Review: The Best Cheap Earbuds
item.description: The name might be a mouthful, but these are the best earbuds I've ever heard under $100.

item.title: Shark Cordless PowerDetect Stick Vacuum: Affordable Cleaning Prowess
